error.message: Class Drupal\bamboo_twig_extensions\TwigExtension\TwigArray extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Class Drupal\bamboo_twig_extensions\TwigExtension\TwigDate extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Class Drupal\bamboo_twig_extensions\TwigExtension\TwigText extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Symfony\Cmf\Component\Routing\RouteObjectInterface::ROUTE_OBJECT is deprecated and removed in Drupal 10. Use Drupal\Core\Routing\RouteObjectInterface::ROUTE_OBJECT instead.
Class Drupal\bamboo_twig_path\TwigExtension\Path extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Class Drupal\bamboo_twig\TwigExtension\TwigExtensionBase extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead

Call to deprecated constant FILE_STATUS_PERMANENT: Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\file\FileInterface::STATUS_PERMANENT or \Drupal\file\FileInterface::setPermanent().
